Translations.Text: Katonda yye yooyo eyabatonda nga abaggya mu muntu omu, ng’ate mu ye mwe yaggya mukyalawe, abeere ng’adda gyali olw'okufuna obutebenkevu, bwe yamala okulabagana naye, naafuna olubuto olwangu, n’ayita nalwo mu mitendera (olubuto mweruyita) olw’amala okukula, baasaba Mukama omulabirizi waabwe, nebagamba nti, singa otuwa omwana omulongoofu, tujja kubeerera ddala mu beebaza
(Naye ate abantu abaddirira) Katonda bwe yabawa omwana omulongoofu, baamugattako e bintu e birala mu ekyo kye yabawala, Katonda w'anjawulo nnyo, kw'ebyo bye bamugattako
Abaffe bagatta ku Katonda ebyo ebitasobola kutonda kintu kyonna, ng’ate byo byatondebwa
Era tebiyinza kubafunira kutaasa wadde bo bennyini okwetaasa
Bwe mubakoowoola okujja eri obulungamu tebabagoberera, kye kimu kamube nga mubayise, oba nga musirise
Mazima abo bemusaba nemuva ku Katonda, baddu nga mmwe, kale mubasabe babaanukule bwe muba nga mwogera mazima

Abaffe balina amagulu nti gebatambuza, oba balina e mikono gye bakwasa, oba balina amaaso gebalabisa, oba balina amatu gebawuliza, gamba nti muyite bye musinza ne mubigatta ku Katonda, olwo nno munneekobaanire temunnindiriza
Mazima omukuumi wange ye Katonda, oyo eyassa e kitabo, era bulijjo yye, ye mukuumi w’abalongoofu
Era mazima ddala be musaba ne mumulekawo, tebasobola kubataasa, era nga bwe batasobola kwetaasa
Bwe mubakoowoola okujja eri obulungamu tebawulira, obalaba nga bakutunuulidde kyokka nga tebalaba
Nywerera ku kusonyiwa, era olagire abantu okweyisa obulungi, era ove ku batategeera
Buli wonna wootuukirwangako okulabankanya kwa Sitane, saba obukuumi bwa Katonda, mazima yye Katonda awulira nnyo, mumanyi
Mazima abo abatya Katonda, bwe baba baggyiddwa okubuzibwabuzibwa okuva eri Sitane, bajjukira Katonda, olwo nno nebalaba e kituufu
Naye nga bannaabwe bongera kubasindika mu bwonoonefu, era nga tebaweera

Bwotabaleetera kya magero, bagamba nti, waakiri waalikyeyiiyirizza, gamba nti, mazima ngoberera ebyo ebiba bimpereddwa okuva ewa Mukama omulabirizi wange. (Kur’ani) eno, mumuli oguvudde ewa Mukama omulabirizi wa mmwe, era bulungamu na kusaasira eri abo abakkiriza
Buli Kur’ani lwesomwanga mugiwulirize, era mugisseeko omulaka, olwo nno mulyoke musaasirwe
Bulijjo jjukira Mukama omulabiriziwo, mu mwoyogwo, nga olaga obugonvu n’okutya, awatali kusitula ddoboozi mu bigambo (nga ekyo okikola), enkya n’eggulo, era tobeeranga mu bagayaavu
Mazima abo abali ewa Mukama omulabiriziwo, tebeekuluntaza nebatamusinza, era ba mutendereza, era nga yye yekka, gwebavunnamira
